overview: Discovering a plot to make her a scapegoat for the murder of her husband, the heir to the Southern King, A pregnant May Wong survives an assassination attempt on her life and defies her patriarchal family tradition while plotting her way to power, with the help of Zan her paramour - Taking no prisoners and showing no mercy.
tagline: Despite the underworld ruled by men, young May Wong proves she’s no fool. Through grit and ferocity, she becomes the Queen of Bangsar.
title: Rise to Power: KLGU
